choose.when: select count(*) from board where boardTitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR noticeContent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from board join Member using(memberSeq) where boardTitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR boardContent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
choose.otherwise: select B.*, A.*,(select count(*) from attachment where B.boardseq=boardno) filecount from board B join member A on(A.memberseq=B.memberseq) order by boarddate desc

mapper.insert: insert into board values(boardseq.nextval,#{memberSeq},#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},default,default) select boardseq.currval from dual
insert into attachment(attachmentno, boardno, originalfilename, renamedfilename) values(seq_attachmentno.nextval,#{boardNo},#{originalFileName},#{renamedFileName})
